df-madu
blocks.content: Define the adjugate or adjunct (matrix of cofactors) of a square matrix. This definition gives the standard cofactors, however the internal minors are not the standard minors, see definition in [Lang] p. 518. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 7-Sep-2015.) (Revised by SO, 10-Jul-2018.)
blocks.origin:
axiom df-madu(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4, setvar s5, setvar s6) {
  |- wceq(cmadu, cmpo(s0, s1, universe, universe, cmpt(s2, cfv(cbs, co(cv(s0), cmat, cv(s1))), cmpo(s3, s4, cv(s0), cv(s0), cfv(co(cv(s0), cmdat, cv(s1)), cmpo(s5, s6, cv(s0), cv(s0), cif(cif(cfv(cur, cv(s1)), cfv(c0g, cv(s1)), wceq(cv(s6), cv(s3))), co(cv(s5), cv(s2), cv(s6)), wceq(cv(s5), cv(s4)))))))))
  -| diffss(s3, s4)
  -| diffss(s3, s5)
  -| diffss(s3, s6)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s4, s5)
  -| diffss(s4, s6)
  -| diffss(s2, s4)
  -| diffss(s0, s4)
  -| diffss(s1, s4)
  -| diffss(s5, s6)
  -| diffss(s2, s5)
  -| diffss(s0, s5)
  -| diffss(s1, s5)
  -| diffss(s2, s6)
  -| diffss(s0, s6)
  -| diffss(s1, s6)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
}

axiom df-madu(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4, setvar s5, setvar s6) {
  ‚ä¢ maAdju =(s0 ‚àà ùïå, s1 ‚àà ùïå ‚Ü¶(s2 ‚àà(Base `(s0[Mat]s1))‚Ü¶(s3 ‚àà s0, s4 ‚àà s0 ‚Ü¶((s0[maDet]s1)`(s5 ‚àà s0, s6 ‚àà s0 ‚Ü¶ if(s5 = s4, if(s6 = s3,(1r ` s1),(0 ` s1)),(s5[s2]s6)))))))
  ‚ä£ d(s3, s4)
  ‚ä£ d(s3, s5)
  ‚ä£ d(s3, s6)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, s3)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s3)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s3)
  ‚ä£ d(s4, s5)
  ‚ä£ d(s4, s6)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, s4)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s4)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s4)
  ‚ä£ d(s5, s6)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, s5)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s5)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s5)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, s6)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s6)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s6)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
}

blocks.name: df-minmar1
blocks.content: Define the matrices whose determinants are the minors of a square matrix. In contrast to the standard definition of minors, a row is replaced by 0's and one 1 instead of deleting the column and row (e.g., definition in [Lang] p. 515). By this, the determinant of such a matrix is equal to the minor determined in the standard way (as determinant of a submatrix, see ~ df-subma - note that the matrix is transposed compared with the submatrix defined in ~ df-subma , but this does not matter because the determinants are the same, see ~ mdettpos ). Such matrices are used in the definition of an adjunct of a square matrix, see ~ df-madu . (Contributed by AV, 27-Dec-2018.)
blocks.origin:
axiom df-minmar1(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4, setvar s5, setvar s6) {
  |- wceq(cminmar1, cmpo(s0, s1, universe, universe, cmpt(s2, cfv(cbs, co(cv(s0), cmat, cv(s1))), cmpo(s3, s4, cv(s0), cv(s0), cmpo(s5, s6, cv(s0), cv(s0), cif(cif(cfv(cur, cv(s1)), cfv(c0g, cv(s1)), wceq(cv(s6), cv(s4))), co(cv(s5), cv(s2), cv(s6)), wceq(cv(s5), cv(s3))))))))
  -| diffss(s5, s6)
  -| diffss(s3, s5)
  -| diffss(s4, s5)
  -| diffss(s2, s5)
  -| diffss(s0, s5)
  -| diffss(s1, s5)
  -| diffss(s3, s6)
  -| diffss(s4, s6)
  -| diffss(s2, s6)
  -| diffss(s0, s6)
  -| diffss(s1, s6)
  -| diffss(s3, s4)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s2, s4)
  -| diffss(s0, s4)
  -| diffss(s1, s4)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
}

  ‚ä¢ minMatR1 =(s0 ‚àà ùïå, s1 ‚àà ùïå ‚Ü¶(s2 ‚àà(Base `(s0[Mat]s1))‚Ü¶(s3 ‚àà s0, s4 ‚àà s0 ‚Ü¶(s5 ‚àà s0, s6 ‚àà s0 ‚Ü¶ if(s5 = s3, if(s6 = s4,(1r ` s1),(0 ` s1)),(s5[s2]s6))))))
  ‚ä£ d(s5, s6)
  ‚ä£ d(s3, s5)
  ‚ä£ d(s4, s5)

blocks.name: mndifsplit
blocks.content: Lemma for ~ maducoeval2 . (Contributed by SO, 16-Jul-2018.)
blocks.origin:
thm mndifsplit(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0, wff w1) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cmnd), wcel(c1, c2), wn(wa(w0, w1))), wceq(cif(c1, c3, wo(w0, w1)), co(cif(c1, c3, w0), c4, cif(c1, c3, w1))))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(c0g, c0))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cplusg, c0))
} = {
  4casesdan(w3a(wcel(c0, cmnd), wcel(c1, c2), wn(wa(w0, w1))), wceq(cif(c1, c3, wo(w0, w1)), co(cif(c1, c3, w0), c4, cif(c1, c3, w1))), w0, w1)
  3ad2antl3(wcel(c0, cmnd), wcel(c1, c2), wn(wa(w0, w1)), wa(w0, w1), wceq(cif(c1, c3, wo(w0, w1)), co(cif(c1, c3, w0), c4, cif(c1, c3, w1))))
  imp(wn(wa(w0, w1)), wa(w0, w1), wceq(cif(c1, c3, wo(w0, w1)), co(cif(c1, c3, w0), c4, cif(c1, c3, w1))))
  pm2.21(wa(w0, w1), wceq(cif(c1, c3, wo(w0, w1)), co(cif(c1, c3, w0), c4, cif(c1, c3, w1))))
  3eqtr4rd(cif(c1, c3, wo(w0, w1)), co(cif(c1, c3, w0), c4, cif(c1, c3, w1)), co(c1, c4, c3), c1, wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cmnd), wcel(c1, c2), wn(wa(w0, w1))), wa(w0, wn(w1))))
  adantr(w3a(wcel(c0, cmnd), wcel(c1, c2), wn(wa(w0, w1))), wa(w0, wn(w1)), wceq(co(c1, c4, c3), c1))
  3adant3(wcel(c0, cmnd), wcel(c1, c2), wn(wa(w0, w1)), wceq(co(c1, c4, c3), c1))
  mndrid(c0, c1, c2, c4, c3)
  adantl(w3a(wcel(c0, cmnd), wcel(c1, c2), wn(wa(w0, w1))), wa(w0, wn(w1)), wceq(co(cif(c1, c3, w0), c4, cif(c1, c3, w1)), co(c1, c4, c3)))
  oveqan12d(cif(c1, c3, w0), c4, cif(c1, c3, w1), c1, c3, w0, wn(w1))
  iftrue(c1, c3, w0)
  ad2antrl(w3a(wcel(c0, cmnd), wcel(c1, c2), wn(wa(w0, w1))), w0, wn(w1), wceq(cif(c1, c3, wo(w0, w1)), c1))
  orcs(w0, wceq(cif(c1, c3, wo(w0, w1)), c1), w1)
  3eqtr4rd(cif(c1, c3, wo(w0, w1)), co(cif(c1, c3, w0), c4, cif(c1, c3, w1)), co(c3, c4, c1), c1, wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cmnd), wcel(c1, c2), wn(wa(w0, w1))), wa(wn(w0), w1)))
  adantr(w3a(wcel(c0, cmnd), wcel(c1, c2), wn(wa(w0, w1))), wa(wn(w0), w1), wceq(co(c3, c4, c1), c1))
  3adant3(wcel(c0, cmnd), wcel(c1, c2), wn(wa(w0, w1)), wceq(co(c3, c4, c1), c1))
  mndlid(c0, c1, c2, c3, c4)
  adantl(w3a(wcel(c0, cmnd), wcel(c1, c2), wn(wa(w0, w1))), wa(wn(w0), w1), wceq(co(cif(c1, c3, w0), c4, cif(c1, c3, w1)), co(c3, c4, c1)))
  oveqan12d(cif(c1, c3, w0), c4, cif(c1, c3, w1), c3, c1, wn(w0), w1)
  iftrue(c1, c3, w1)
  ad2antll(w3a(wcel(c0, cmnd), wcel(c1, c2), wn(wa(w0, w1))), wn(w0), w1, wceq(cif(c1, c3, wo(w0, w1)), c1))
  olcs(w1, wceq(cif(c1, c3, wo(w0, w1)), c1), w0)
  iftrue(c1, c3, wo(w0, w1))
  3eqtr4rd(cif(c1, c3, wo(w0, w1)), co(cif(c1, c3, w0), c4, cif(c1, c3, w1)), co(c3, c4, c3), c3, wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cmnd), wcel(c1, c2), wn(wa(w0, w1))), wa(wn(w0), wn(w1))))
  adantr(w3a(wcel(c0, cmnd), wcel(c1, c2), wn(wa(w0, w1))), wa(wn(w0), wn(w1)), wceq(co(c3, c4, c3), c3))
  syl2anc(w3a(wcel(c0, cmnd), wcel(c1, c2), wn(wa(w0, w1))), wceq(co(c3, c4, c3), c3), wcel(c0, cmnd), wcel(c3, c2))
  syl(w3a(wcel(c0, cmnd), wcel(c1, c2), wn(wa(w0, w1))), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c0, cmnd))
  simp1(wcel(c0, cmnd), wcel(c1, c2), wn(wa(w0, w1)))
  mndidcl(c0, c3, c2)
  mndlid(c0, c3, c2, c3, c4)
  adantl(w3a(wcel(c0, cmnd), wcel(c1, c2), wn(wa(w0, w1))), wa(wn(w0), wn(w1)), wceq(co(cif(c1, c3, w0), c4, cif(c1, c3, w1)), co(c3, c4, c3)))
  oveqan12d(cif(c1, c3, w0), c4, cif(c1, c3, w1), c3, c3, wn(w0), wn(w1))
  iffalse(c1, c3, w0)
  iffalse(c1, c3, w1)
  adantl(w3a(wcel(c0, cmnd), wcel(c1, c2), wn(wa(w0, w1))), wa(wn(w0), wn(w1)), wceq(cif(c1, c3, wo(w0, w1)), c3))
  sylbir(wa(wn(w0), wn(w1)), wceq(cif(c1, c3, wo(w0, w1)), c3), wn(wo(w0, w1)))
  ioran(w0, w1)
  iffalse(c1, c3, wo(w0, w1))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm mndifsplit(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0, wff w1) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà Mnd ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2 ‚àß ¬¨(w0 ‚àß w1))‚Üí if((w0 ‚à® w1), c1, c3)=(if(w0, c1, c3)[c4]if(w1, c1, c3)))
  ‚ä£ c2 =(Base ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c3 =(0 ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c4 =(+ ` c0)
} = {
  4casesdan((c0 ‚àà Mnd ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2 ‚àß ¬¨(w0 ‚àß w1)), if((w0 ‚à® w1), c1, c3)=(if(w0, c1, c3)[c4]if(w1, c1, c3)), w0, w1)
  3ad2antl3(c0 ‚àà Mnd, c1 ‚àà c2, ¬¨(w0 ‚àß w1), (w0 ‚àß w1), if((w0 ‚à® w1), c1, c3)=(if(w0, c1, c3)[c4]if(w1, c1, c3)))
  imp(¬¨(w0 ‚àß w1), (w0 ‚àß w1), if((w0 ‚à® w1), c1, c3)=(if(w0, c1, c3)[c4]if(w1, c1, c3)))
  pm2.21((w0 ‚àß w1), if((w0 ‚à® w1), c1, c3)=(if(w0, c1, c3)[c4]if(w1, c1, c3)))
  3eqtr4rd(if((w0 ‚à® w1), c1, c3), (if(w0, c1, c3)[c4]if(w1, c1, c3)), (c1[c4]c3), c1, ((c0 ‚àà Mnd ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2 ‚àß ¬¨(w0 ‚àß w1))‚àß(w0 ‚àß ¬¨ w1)))
  adantr((c0 ‚àà Mnd ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2 ‚àß ¬¨(w0 ‚àß w1)), (w0 ‚àß ¬¨ w1), (c1[c4]c3)= c1)
  3adant3(c0 ‚àà Mnd, c1 ‚àà c2, ¬¨(w0 ‚àß w1), (c1[c4]c3)= c1)
  mndrid(c0, c1, c2, c4, c3)
  adantl((c0 ‚àà Mnd ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2 ‚àß ¬¨(w0 ‚àß w1)), (w0 ‚àß ¬¨ w1), (if(w0, c1, c3)[c4]if(w1, c1, c3))=(c1[c4]c3))
  oveqan12d(if(w0, c1, c3), c4, if(w1, c1, c3), c1, c3, w0, ¬¨ w1)
  iftrue(c1, c3, w0)
  ad2antrl((c0 ‚àà Mnd ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2 ‚àß ¬¨(w0 ‚àß w1)), w0, ¬¨ w1, if((w0 ‚à® w1), c1, c3)= c1)
  orcs(w0, if((w0 ‚à® w1), c1, c3)= c1, w1)
  3eqtr4rd(if((w0 ‚à® w1), c1, c3), (if(w0, c1, c3)[c4]if(w1, c1, c3)), (c3[c4]c1), c1, ((c0 ‚àà Mnd ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2 ‚àß ¬¨(w0 ‚àß w1))‚àß(¬¨ w0 ‚àß w1)))
  adantr((c0 ‚àà Mnd ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2 ‚àß ¬¨(w0 ‚àß w1)), (¬¨ w0 ‚àß w1), (c3[c4]c1)= c1)
  3adant3(c0 ‚àà Mnd, c1 ‚àà c2, ¬¨(w0 ‚àß w1), (c3[c4]c1)= c1)
  mndlid(c0, c1, c2, c3, c4)
  adantl((c0 ‚àà Mnd ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2 ‚àß ¬¨(w0 ‚àß w1)), (¬¨ w0 ‚àß w1), (if(w0, c1, c3)[c4]if(w1, c1, c3))=(c3[c4]c1))
  oveqan12d(if(w0, c1, c3), c4, if(w1, c1, c3), c3, c1, ¬¨ w0, w1)
  iftrue(c1, c3, w1)
  ad2antll((c0 ‚àà Mnd ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2 ‚àß ¬¨(w0 ‚àß w1)), ¬¨ w0, w1, if((w0 ‚à® w1), c1, c3)= c1)
  olcs(w1, if((w0 ‚à® w1), c1, c3)= c1, w0)
  iftrue(c1, c3, (w0 ‚à® w1))
  3eqtr4rd(if((w0 ‚à® w1), c1, c3), (if(w0, c1, c3)[c4]if(w1, c1, c3)), (c3[c4]c3), c3, ((c0 ‚àà Mnd ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2 ‚àß ¬¨(w0 ‚àß w1))‚àß(¬¨ w0 ‚àß ¬¨ w1)))
  adantr((c0 ‚àà Mnd ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2 ‚àß ¬¨(w0 ‚àß w1)), (¬¨ w0 ‚àß ¬¨ w1), (c3[c4]c3)= c3)
  syl2anc((c0 ‚àà Mnd ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2 ‚àß ¬¨(w0 ‚àß w1)), (c3[c4]c3)= c3, c0 ‚àà Mnd, c3 ‚àà c2)
  syl((c0 ‚àà Mnd ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2 ‚àß ¬¨(w0 ‚àß w1)), c3 ‚àà c2, c0 ‚àà Mnd)
  simp1(c0 ‚àà Mnd, c1 ‚àà c2, ¬¨(w0 ‚àß w1))
  mndidcl(c0, c3, c2)
  mndlid(c0, c3, c2, c3, c4)
  adantl((c0 ‚àà Mnd ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2 ‚àß ¬¨(w0 ‚àß w1)), (¬¨ w0 ‚àß ¬¨ w1), (if(w0, c1, c3)[c4]if(w1, c1, c3))=(c3[c4]c3))
  oveqan12d(if(w0, c1, c3), c4, if(w1, c1, c3), c3, c3, ¬¨ w0, ¬¨ w1)
  iffalse(c1, c3, w0)
  iffalse(c1, c3, w1)
  adantl((c0 ‚àà Mnd ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2 ‚àß ¬¨(w0 ‚àß w1)), (¬¨ w0 ‚àß ¬¨ w1), if((w0 ‚à® w1), c1, c3)= c3)
  sylbir((¬¨ w0 ‚àß ¬¨ w1), if((w0 ‚à® w1), c1, c3)= c3, ¬¨(w0 ‚à® w1))
  ioran(w0, w1)
  iffalse(c1, c3, (w0 ‚à® w1))
}

blocks.name: madufval
blocks.content: First substitution for the adjunct (cofactor) matrix. (Contributed by SO, 11-Jul-2018.)
blocks.origin:
thm madufval(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7) {
  |- wceq(c0, cmpt(s0, c1, cmpo(s1, s2, c2, c2, cfv(c3, cmpo(s3, s4, c2, c2, cif(cif(c4, c5, wceq(cv(s4), cv(s1))), co(cv(s3), cv(s0), cv(s4)), wceq(cv(s3), cv(s2))))))))
  -| wceq(c6, co(c2, cmat, c7))
  -| wceq(c3, co(c2, cmdat, c7))
  -| wceq(c0, co(c2, cmadu, c7))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, c6))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cur, c7))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(c0g, c7))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s0, s4)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s1, s4)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
  -| diffss(s2, s4)
  -| diffss(s3, s4)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c7)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c7)
  -| diffsc(s2, c2)
  -| diffsc(s2, c7)
  -| diffsc(s3, c2)
  -| diffsc(s3, c7)
  -| diffsc(s4, c2)
  -| diffsc(s4, c7)
} = {

blocks.name: maduval
blocks.content: Second substitution for the adjunct (cofactor) matrix. (Contributed by SO, 11-Jul-2018.)

thm maduval(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, class c8) {

  -| wceq(c4, co(c3, cmdat, c8))

  -| diffsc(s3, c8)
} = {
  mpdan(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(cfv(c2, c0), cmpo(s0, s1, c3, c3, cfv(c4, cmpo(s2, s3, c3, c3, cif(cif(c5, c6, wceq(cv(s3), cv(s0))), co(cv(s2), c0, cv(s3)), wceq(cv(s2), cv(s1))))))), wcel(cmpo(s0, s1, c3, c3, cfv(c4, cmpo(s2, s3, c3, c3, cif(cif(c5, c6, wceq(cv(s3), cv(s0))), co(cv(s2), c0, cv(s3)), wceq(cv(s2), cv(s1)))))), universe))

thm madutpos(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, ccrg), wcel(c1, c2)), wceq(cfv(c3, ctpos(c1)), ctpos(cfv(c3, c1))))
  -| wceq(c4, co(c5, cmat, c0))
  -| wceq(c3, co(c5, cmadu, c0))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c4))
} = {
  mpbird(wa(wcel(c0, ccrg), wcel(c1, c2)), wceq(cfv(c3, ctpos(c1)), ctpos(cfv(c3, c1))), wral(hs0, c5, wral(hs1, c5, wceq(co(cv(hs0), cfv(c3, ctpos(c1)), cv(hs1)), co(cv(hs0), ctpos(cfv(c3, c1)), cv(hs1))))))

blocks.name: madugsum
blocks.content: The determinant of a matrix with a row ` L ` consisting of the same element ` X ` is the sum of the elements of the ` L ` -th column of the adjunct of the matrix multiplied with ` X ` . (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 16-Jul-2018.)
blocks.origin:
thm madugsum(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, class c8, class c9, class c10, wff w0) {

  -| wceq(c8, co(c1, cmat, c0))
  -| wceq(c4, co(c1, cmadu, c0))
  -| wceq(c9, cfv(cbs, c8))
  -| wceq(c7, co(c1, cmdat, c0))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cmulr, c0))
  -| wceq(c10, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c5, c9))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, ccrg))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wcel(c2, c10))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c6, c1))

  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s0, c5)
  -| diffsc(s0, c6)
  -| diffsc(s0, c9)

  -| diffsc(s1, c10)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c5)
  -| diffsc(s1, c6)
  -| diffsc(s1, c9)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(w0, wceq(co(c0, cgsu, cmpt(s0, c1, co(c2, c3, co(cv(s0), cfv(c4, c5), c6)))), cfv(c7, cmpo(s1, s0, c1, c1, cif(c2, co(cv(s1), c5, cv(s0)), wceq(cv(s1), c6)))))), diffsc(s0, c0))

  a1ii(wi(w0, wceq(co(c0, cgsu, cmpt(s0, c1, co(c2, c3, co(cv(s0), cfv(c4, c5), c6)))), cfv(c7, cmpo(s1, s0, c1, c1, cif(c2, co(cv(s1), c5, cv(s0)), wceq(cv(s1), c6)))))), diffsc(s1, c10))

blocks.name: madurid
blocks.content: Multiplying a matrix with its adjunct results in the identity matrix multiplied with the determinant of the matrix. See Proposition 4.16 in [Lang] p. 518. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 16-Jul-2018.)

blocks.name: madulid
blocks.content: Multiplying the adjunct of a matrix with the matrix results in the identity matrix multiplied with the determinant of the matrix. See Proposition 4.16 in [Lang] p. 518. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 17-Jul-2018.)
